attributes.action: Remove party names and symbols from all ballot papers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
At local and general elections, we vote for individual candidates, not for parties. For this reason, party names and symbols should be removed from ballot papers.

This will serve to remind voters that they are voting for a specific man or woman and not for the party they belong to.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
